title: Bullet Crow, Fowl of Fortune (Eclipse fill)
description:
A bolt of lightning to the cranial antenna awakens the ECUP from the Sleep of Nepenthe, with 'Bullet Crow, Fowl of Fortune'!

Bullet Crow was a broad parody of the superhero genre, in which the ebony avian fought crime along with his sidekick, Coronary Canary.  Both were dramatically upstaged when BC hired a secretary, Bonnie Bunny, a rather dimwitted, blond, braless bunnygirl. The strip was written and illustrated by Chuck Fiala, and originally serialized in The Comic Reader fanzine between 1979 and 1984. In 1987, Eclipse collected the strips and published them in B&W over two issues.

Bunches of thanks to Mr. Fiala and the scanners! Shag it and share it!
